description: CLI tool that processes deploy.csv to prepare deployment batches. Supports PRODUCTION_CORE (Tues), PRODUCTION_MICROSRVC (Thu), and STAGING (Fri) modes. Filters CSV rows and prepares deployment metadata.
parameters: Operations: PRODUCTION_CORE, PRODUCTION_MICROSRVC, STAGING; --source: CSV file; --auth: GitHub PAT; --dryrun: simulate only
examples: CMD: python3 deployEnviron.py deploy PRODUCTION_CORE --source deploy.csv
